turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I got to get four large I'm sorry, four small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 4 small pizzas. what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one with They still have the five cheese blend?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes they do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One five cheese blend, one meat lover's, one Hawaiian, and one just plain, regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the crossing all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say thick crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yap.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you repeat what size you would like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you. so 5 small pizzas, 1 five cheese blend, one meat lovers, one hawaiian and one cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, thank you. your total is $45.00.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bela Luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you, enjoy!
